short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It clicks the skip ad button automatically on YouTube immediately

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Brand New 2022 YouTube Extension that does the work of clicking the Skip Ads button on youtube videos, The best part is that it you do not have to wait for 5 seconds for the ad anymore. It will automatically skip the ad as soon as it comes to your screens, NO_MORE_WAITING_FOR_5_SECONDS.

A plugin for automatically pressing Skip Ad button on youtube videos and hides the ad banners from youtube.

This extension simply helps you automatically CLICK the "Skip Ad" button once it's visible. This way even the content creator gets paid and you don't need to manually click the "Skip Ad" button.
P.S. It is unable to skip unskippable ads for now.

Enjoy and feedbacks are welcomed!
